Thu, 09 Jan 2025 21:55:50 +0000 A man has been arrested following an hours-long chase, police car ramming and knife-point carjacking.
Gisborne, East Coast paddlers heading to Karapiro for sprint nationals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/gisborne-east-coast-paddlers-heading-to-karapiro-for-sprint-nationals/JY2JS6LYKRHGXOAO73JWG7CLBU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/gisborne-east-coast-paddlers-heading-to-karapiro-for-sprint-nationals/JY2JS6LYKRHGXOAO73JWG7CLBU/ John Gillies'True test of resilience' for Tairāwhiti crews Thu, 09 Jan 2025 21:51:33 +0000 Destination Karapiro....a large number of Tairāwhiti paddlers and supporters are making their way to the Waikato for the 35th anniversary Waka Ama Sprint Nationals on Lake Karapiro near Cambridge. This year's nationals has attracted a record 3875 participants from all across Aotearoa - a 19% growth in participation numbers from the 2024 champs.
